text: Ni jwaŵisile mwalakwemo yakunyichisya pachanya pakwe (matumbi), ni ŵalipele upile (litakalyo pakuŵikapo mesi, m’mela ni inyama), ni jwapimilepo yakulya yakwe (yakwakwanila ŵakutama palakwepo, jwatesile yalakweyi) m’moŵa ncheche gakuliingaana. (Yalakweyi ni yakwanila) kwa akuwusya (ya kagumbidwe ketaka ni yaili palakwepo)
